description: Vinna told her husband Nyko about the hot sex she had yesterday with a young jock named Angelo. Since he did not believe her, she decided to invite the gorgeous muscled dude over, without telling him that her husband would like to watch. As soon as Angelo found out what they had in mind, Vinna's husband grabbed him so she could put the HypnoMask on.
title: Husband Watches, Scene #01
